H0.text: Gibberellins are the hormones that cause a plant to grow.

H1.text: Sporozans are the hormones that cause a plant to grow.

H2.text: Pores are the hormones that cause a plant to grow.

H3.text: Pistills are the hormones that cause a plant to grow.

A4.text: Gibberellins cause also seed germination by breaking the seed's dormancy and acting as a chemical messenger.

A5.text: They stimulate cell elongation, breaking and budding, and seedless fruits.
